ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Added Ssd 1306 OLED display and Eden Board OLED apps for Raspberry Pi - Added new ZWave Api commands: SensorBinary.Get, SensorMultiLevel.Get, Meter.Get, Meter.SupportedGet, Meter.Reset - Added "Meter.Power" parameter handling to Z-Wave MIG interface (Watt counter of a module) - Added system configuration saving on interface settings change - Added (ZWaveLib) duplicate message check for incoming messages - Improved (ZWaveLib) nodes discovery/capability get process
